label: 延喜式
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: This massive ritual text produced at the order of emperor Daigo over the course of the period from 905 to 927 built on the precedents of the Kōninshiki (ca. 810-24) and Jōganshiki (to be distinguished from Jōgan gishiki; ca. 870) and served as the most dependable manual of court protocol and politics for centuries after.
